name: Zuzalu Views: All-In Podcast #125
description:
Weekly viewing party of All-In Podcast in the boardroom. Feel free to coworkwhile we watch, Chedi hosts coffee, tea, and water in the common space.


All-In Podcast:
Industry veterans, degenerate gamblers and besties Chamath Palihapitiya, Jason Calacanis, David Sacks and David Friedberg cover all things economic, tech, political, social and poker.
